def_cn: 幸存者;生还者;幸免于难者
def_en: A survivor of a disaster, accident, or illness is someone who continues to live afterwards in spite of coming close to death.

def_cn: 遭遇过(不幸经历)的人;经受过(苦难)的人
def_en: A survivor of a very unpleasant experience is a person who has had such an experience, and who is still affected by it.

def_cn: (死者的)尚在世的家人;遗属
def_en: A person's survivors are the members of their family who continue to live after they have died.

def_cn: 能在艰苦环境中生存的人;挺过困难者
def_en: If you describe someone as a survivor, you approve of the fact that they are able to carry on with their life even though they experience many difficulties.

def_cn: 活到现在的人;留存至今的事物
def_en: If you describe a person or thing as a survivor from an earlier period, you mean that they are still present or available, but other people or things from that period have died or disappeared.
